import React, { Component } from 'react'; const default_border_style = "border p-5 border-3 rounded-5 border-" class ComputationForm extends Component { state = { capital: "", risk_percentage: "", stock_ticker: "", entry_price: "", stop_loss: "", computationOutput: "" } render() { return (
this.setState({capital:e.target.value})} /> Your current total portfolio capital.
this.setState({risk_percentage:e.target.value})} /> Percentage of portfolio capital you are willing to risk from 0 to 100%.
{/* this.setState({stock_ticker:e.target.value})} /> Your current portfolio capital. */}
this.setState({entry_price:e.target.value})} />
this.setState({stop_loss:e.target.value})} />

{this.state.computationOutput}

{this.state.capital}

{this.state.risk_percentage}

{this.state.stock_ticker}

{this.state.entry_price}

{this.state.stop_loss}

 ); } handleComputation = () => { const curr = this.state; const result = (curr.capital * (curr.risk_percentage/100) ) / (curr.entry_price - curr.stop_loss) this.setState({computationOutput: "Your recommended position size is " + result + " shares."}); } } export default ComputationForm;
